title: League not launching
body: Alright, so I've been having this problem for 2 weeks maybe and I was just wondering if anyone had a fix for it. The problem is when i open my league and I get to the Launch i click launch and then nothing happens. I go to look in my task manager and nothing is running. I really need help with this, i have windows.

replies.body: The patcher not appearing can be caused by an OS or antivirus security setting blocking it.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should restore access by adding League as an exception.  I know you've had this issue for quite a bit, so I hope this helps!
